properties.displayName: [Preview]: Configure allowed registries for specified Azure Machine Learning computes
properties.description: This policy helps provide registries that are allowed in specified Azure Machine Learning computes and can be assigned at the workspace. For more information, visit https://aka.ms/amlpolicydoc.

metadata.displayName: [Preview]: Compute names where Azure ML jobs run
metadata.description: List of compute names where this policy should be applied. Ex. cpu-cluster;gpu-cluster. If no value is provided to this parameter then policy is applicable to all computes.
List of Azure Container Registries that can be used with Azure ML. Ex. amlrepo.azurecr.io;amlrepo.azurecr.io/foo
Enable or disable the execution of the policy.
